threshold.description: Controls how dark a pixel needs to be to become black (0-255). Lower = bolder, Higher = lighter

turdsize.description: Minimum area (in pixels) for a path to be included. Higher = removes small details

alphamax.description: Corner threshold for curve smoothing. Lower = sharper corners, Higher = smoother curves

opttolerance.description: Curve optimization tolerance. Lower = more precise curves, Higher = simpler curves

longcurve.description: Enable long curve optimization for smoother paths

scale.description: Scaling factor for the output SVG. 1.0 = original size
